hero.title: We transform ideas into solid evidence
hero.subtitle: High-level scientific consulting and meta-research to improve evidence-based decision making.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: The Center for Scientific Consulting and Meta-Research in Biomedical Sciences (CECIMIB) is an independent center for the generation, use, and transfer of knowledge based on research and critical analysis of biomedical research. Our main goal is to provide data, trends, patterns, and diagnostics on the quality of methods, principles, and foresight of scientific activity.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Based on the originality, relevance, pertinence, and quality of our methodology, we aim to become a sustainable, accredited, and reference research center at both national and international levels, developing independent lines of research that solve specific scientific needs.

systematization.title: Evidence Systematization
systematization.description: We systematize the evidence you need for clinical decisions and health policies.

assessment.title: Technology Assessment
assessment.description: We evaluate health technologies with methodological rigor and cost-effective vision.

strengthening.title: Group Strengthening
strengthening.description: We strengthen or create research groups, boosting their sustainability and productivity.

design.title: Study Design
design.description: We design studies that generate knowledge about health interventions and outcomes.

positioning.title: Scientific Positioning
positioning.description: We help position your scientific production in the international scientific discourse, with high-impact articles.
